participant_1.background:
I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way.
I am a YouTuber who creates content for my audience.
i live in new york city.
I believe in a progressive tax system, which means that people with higher incomes pay a higher percentage of their income in taxes than people with lower incomes
I love eating at the local sports bar with my son after his games.

participant_2.background:
I once met a celebrity while I was walking my dogs.
my major was american literature and education.
My landlord is raising my rent, so I bought a used Ford Focus to save money.
I am pleased that my family is close and that I get to spend a lot of time with them.
my father died when i was 2.

content.text: Hey! What do you do for fun?
My favorite pastime is reading. What do you like to do?
I love to play video games. I'm a bit of a YouTube star myself.
Wow that is really cool! Do you make any money doing it?
I do, a little bit. It's just a hobby for now, but it could turn into a career one day.
That's great! What kind of videos do you make?
I do a lot of gaming videos and vlogs about my life in New York City.
New York City, that's so cool! I've always wanted to live there.
It's a great place, but it can be expensive.
I bet! My landlord is raising my rent, so I bought a used Ford Focus to save money.
That's smart! I'm glad you're able to make it work.
Thanks! I'm just glad I have a good job and a close family.
That's what's important. I'm lucky to have a great family too.
Well, I'm glad we had this chat. It was nice to meet you.
You too! Maybe we can hang out sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend
